info.name: Emojis
info.description: Send emoji as link if it can't be sent it normally.

defaultConfig.name: Send Directly
defaultConfig.note: Send the emoji link in a message directly instead of putting it in the chat box.

defaultConfig.name: Ignore Embed Permissions
defaultConfig.note: Send emoji links regardless of embed permissions, meaning links will not turn into images.

defaultConfig.name: Send animated emojis
defaultConfig.note: Animated emojis are sent as GIFs, making most of them hidden by discord's GIF tag.

defaultConfig.name: Send animated as webp
defaultConfig.note: Meaning the emoji will show only the first frame, making them act as normal emoji, unless the first frame is empty.

defaultConfig.name: Emoji Size
defaultConfig.note: The size of the Emoji in pixels.
